snippet: A 15-month-old girl was killed on Saturday by a stray bullet that pierced a wall in her family’s apartment in northern New Jersey, the authorities said.
abstract: Fifteen-month-old girl is killed by stray bullet that pierces wall of her family's home in Irvington, NJ.
lead_paragraph: A 15-month-old girl was killed on Saturday by a stray bullet that pierced a wall in her family’s apartment in northern New Jersey, the authorities said.

headline.main: Stray Shot Kills a Child in New Jersey
